alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 4:37AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Emery...eastern Carbon and southeastern Duchesne Counties through 515 AM MDT... At 436 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Wellington, or 14 miles southeast of Price, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunnyside and East Carbon. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 250 and 269. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
